title: Asthma exacerbation

fields.name: reliever_plan
fields.label: Reliever inhaler plan
fields.helpText: Include dose/frequency for the next 48–72 hours.

body:
You were treated today for an asthma flare.

Reliever inhaler plan:
{{reliever_plan}}

{{#if steroid_course}}Oral steroid course:
{{steroid_course}}

{{/if}}Red flags – return to ED urgently if you develop:
- Severe shortness of breath, difficulty speaking, or blue lips
- Reliever not working for more than 4 hours
- Increasing drowsiness or exhaustion

Follow-up: {{followup_timeframe}}.

Continue your usual preventer inhaler unless advised otherwise.
disclaimer: This letter is general advice and does not replace follow-up with your usual clinician.
